column4: her...rather weirdly, unity 3D isn't showing anymore. I was trying Gnome-shell, which was really really slow (there's something wrong that's for sure) and when I tried to get back to Unity, the dash and the top bar wouldn't show.
I have an Asus G60jx, so it's rather up to date. Unity 3D was working perfectly before.
nvidia with up to date xorg/drivers.
I'm one more than the current.
and it was working fine all day, until I tried Gnome-shell.
is 12.04 super stable or just normal? I want to know as i am also planning to switch to 12.04
the oldest distro still active you mean?
